msbt.message: I'm so pleased this year's zodiac sign is the rat. I say it's time we little ones get a wee bit more attention! Of course, a whole year in the limelight might be exhausting for some. Not me, darling! I'm ready to show the world that fabulous things come in small packages.

You know, is the Year of the Ox. But I think I shall call it the Year of the Cow, . I had planned to spend the year blending into the background here on . But no! It's time I grab the bull by the horns and shine for all cow-kind!
It's the Year of the Tiger, you know. That meansit's the Year of ! That must be why my fur looks even more fabulous than usual, !
Did you hear? is the Year of the Rabbit. That's right! It is MY year, ! I do hope the year doesn't just race by. I must be sure to slow down and truly appreciate it.

Why, , do you know what this year is? It's the Year of the Horse, ! The Year of the Horse takes place only once every 12 years, if you can believe it. Of course, you heard it straight from the horse's mouth, so I assure you you CAN believe it.

I realize that is the Year of the Sheepbut it's not like anything changes for me, . I'm just going to do what I always do Pamper myself and shop for shoes. Though now that I think about it, perhaps I DO deserve to buy an extra pair of shoes or five.
At long last, , it is the Year of the Monkey. It comes only once every 12 years, you know. It really should happen more often. After all, everyone enjoys having an excuse to monkey around!

Oh, ! Wonderful news! This year is the Year of the Rooster! It doesn't matter whether you're wise as an owl, silly as a goose, or graceful as a swan I say this is a time for birds of a feather to flock together!
At long last, it is the Year of the Dog again. I can't believe it only comes once every 12 years!Well, no need to give me any special treatment. That isunless you really feel you must, .
I can't help but feel this year is going to be an especially good one for me. Why, just look at my snout! It is positively aglow with the possibilities already, !
